body:
Man or Woman, this is an outright obscene act to commit on a grieving widow and her impressionable son. Whomever it was that commissioned this truly wasn't disciplined enough as a child.


-Aimiee Lewd Lemieux
"You finally exposed your true nature." How does the fact that she masterbated alone at night after you gave her an aphrodisiac reveal anything about her "true nature"?
